State Regulations
TABLE I
CLASSIFICATIONS AND STANDARDS OF QUALITY AND PURITY
ASSIGNED TO ALL FRESH SURFACE WATERS WITHIN THE LAKE ERIE (WEST END) AND
TRIBUTARY DRAINAGE BASINS IN CHAUTAUQUA COUNTY EXCEPT CATTARAUGUS CREEK AND
SILVER CREEK DRAINAGE BASINS

E
(Lake Erie) Dunkirk Harbor

That portion of lake bounded on west and south by
shoreline, on north by line extended from Point Gratiot to Battery Point and on
east by line extending along Ocelot St. in City of Dunkirk to Point

Gratiot-Battery Point line. L-2ne
B
B
2
E
(Lake Erie) Barcelona Harbor

That portion of lake bounded on west by shoreline, on north by west and east breakwaters and line drawn between their northern
tips; on east by earthfill pier and line drawn from southern tip of east
breakwater to said pier and on south by shoreline. L-1se
B
B
3
E
(Lake Erie)

Remaining portion of lake within area bounded as
follows: beginning at west bank of Eighteenmile Creek; thence following line
perpendicular to west bank of Eighteenmile Creek and extended to international
boundary line; thence along the international boundary line to point where
extension of New York-Pennsylvania state line intersects the international
boundary line; thence along said extension to shoreline; thence along New York
shores of lake to point of beginning. A-Special*
